urls.title: 10 photo stories about parties & hedonism through history
urls.description: On World Photo Day 2022, we're looking at some of our fave stories of the last year.

British filmmaker @jesskohlx is a documentarian focusing on underground subcultures across Asia. She's made films focusing on punk rockers in the Philippines, a transgender festival in India, and skinhead tensions in Malaysia. Now on Neocha! #ArtistsofSEA
https://t.co/B9gchBu42N https://t.co/mFyHR6RlNw

‘Nirvana’ from @jesskohlx & @PRETTYBIRDUK explores a topic rarely covered: #transgender life in #India. With compassion, the film follows two transgender women on their journey to the biggest transgender festival in the world
#OWMAwards2019 View here: https://t.co/g6MyUHthyS https://t.co/UffiBmUheu
